textBeforeTable: Print Settings Choose from a wide range of settings *In the case of iOS, for JPEG data it is possible to select the "Scan Data Folder" in the app or the standard "photo" folder. Data saved on the smart device can be accessed in the "Scan Data Folder"*. Scanned data can, of course, be printed, and by using the transmission function of another app, it is possible to send scanned data by email. Use the scanned data which was saved
textAfterTable: Job Type Normal Print Normal Print, Locked Print Print Quality Speed Priority Speed Priority, Quality Priority, High Quality *Color devices only. On the setting menu, two-color printing needs to be set on.
